gw.api.activity

Interface PublicActivityTeamViewFinder


  • public interface PublicActivityTeamViewFinder
    Provides methods for finding ActivityTeamViews.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IQueryBeanResult findAssignedToUser(User user, Group group)
      Finds activities assigned to the specified user and group.
      IQueryBeanResult findInQueuesForGroup(Group group)
      Finds activities assigned to queues related to the specified group.
      IQueryBeanResult findPendingByGroup(Group group, boolean onlyRetrieveUnassigned)
      Finds activities assigned to the specified group.
      IQueryBeanResult findStaleOrFailedAssignmentsByGroup(Group group)
      Finds activities for the given group.

    • Method Detail

      • findPendingByGroup

        IQueryBeanResult findPendingByGroup(Group group,
                                    boolean onlyRetrieveUnassigned)
        Finds activities assigned to the specified group. Returns ActivityTeamViews which are: 1) assigned to group AND not assignment review (if onlyRetrieveUnassigned is true) OR 2) has no assigned user, OR 3) assignment status is not null and not assigned
        Parameters:
        group - the group to find activities for
        onlyRetrieveUnassigned - if true, also finds unassigned activities
        Returns:
        query results of activities assigned to the given group

      • findStaleOrFailedAssignmentsByGroup

        IQueryBeanResult findStaleOrFailedAssignmentsByGroup(Group group)
        Finds activities for the given group. Returns ActivityTeamViews which: 1) assigned to group with non-null user, AND 2) assigned user is not a member of the group OR is default owner
        Parameters:
        group - the group to find activities for
        Returns:
        query results of activities assigined to the given group

      • findInQueuesForGroup

        IQueryBeanResult findInQueuesForGroup(Group group)
        Finds activities assigned to queues related to the specified group.
        Parameters:
        group - activities for queues for this group will be returned
        Returns:
        query results of activities assigned to queues related to the given group

      • findAssignedToUser

        IQueryBeanResult findAssignedToUser(User user,
                                    Group group)
        Finds activities assigned to the specified user and group.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to find activities for
        group - the group to find activities for
        Returns:
        query results of activities assigned to the given user and group
